text.section: Before taking office each member shall take the oath required by Article I, Section 9 of the Maryland Constitution.
The Public School Labor Relations Board shall elect a chair from among its members.

section.section: The term of a member is 5 years.
The terms of members are staggered as required by the terms provided for members of the Board on July 1, 2010.
At the end of a term a member continues to serve until a successor is appointed and qualifies.
A member who is appointed after a term has begun serves only for the remainder of that term.

text.section: The Governor may remove a member only for incompetence or misconduct.
